content:
Hi. I get this error when I use @Lloyd McKenzie 's framework.
[java] Jekyll has failed - not installed (correcty?). Complete output from running Jekyll: [31m Liquid Exception: Could not locate the included file 'index.xml' in any of ["C:/HL7/IGs/hl7-be/be-core-ig/temp/pages/_includes"]. Ensure it exists in one of those directories and, if it is a symlink, does not point outside your site source. in index (56.0059sec)
@Lloyd McKenzie (may be a little slow - he's at the beach - in Canada!)
It's August, capitalize on the one week of summer!
Ah good for him. Anyway, I just realised it was on my side. bad content on my page sources
(As I work on these things, I wish I can help with smoothing the path for others, like making sense of the possible errors)
